name: COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania v. Jeffrey Scott MORGAN, Appellant

judges: Before O’BRIEN, C.J., and ROBERTS, NIX, LARSEN, FLAHERTY, McDERMOTT and HUTCHINSON, JJ.
parties: COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania v. Jeffrey Scott MORGAN, Appellant.

opinions.text:
ORDER
PER CURIAM:
Judgment of sentence affirmed.
opinions.author: PER CURIAM:

attorneys: William E. Schadler, Lebanon (Court-appointed), for appellant.
William L. Thurston, Lebanon, for appellee.
casebody.head_matter:
452 A.2d 1013
COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania v. Jeffrey Scott MORGAN, Appellant.
Supreme Court of Pennsylvania.
Argued Oct. 21, 1982.
Decided Dec. 10, 1982.
William E. Schadler, Lebanon (Court-appointed), for appellant.
William L. Thurston, Lebanon, for appellee.
Before O’BRIEN, C.J., and ROBERTS, NIX, LARSEN, FLAHERTY, McDERMOTT and HUTCHINSON, JJ.
